name: Demon Slayer Box Set (Vol.1–23)
short: Kimetsu no Yaiba complete manga box set
description: Complete 23-volume Demon Slayer manga box set with premium storage case. Follow Tanjiro's entire journey from beginning to end.
author: Koyoharu Gotouge

name: Jujutsu Kaisen Vol. 1
description: Yuji Itadori swallows Sukuna's finger and begins his chaotic days at Tokyo Jujutsu High School.
author: Gege Akutami

name: Chainsaw Man Box Set (Vol.1–11)
description: Denji and Pochita's strange partnership. A bloody yet heartbreaking story collected in Part 1 box set.
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto

name: Attack on Titan Vol. 1
description: When titans breach Wall Maria, Eren Yeager witnesses unimaginable horror and vows revenge against the titans.
author: Hajime Isayama

name: My Hero Academia Vol. 1
short: Izuku's journey to become a hero
description: Izuku Midoriya dreams of becoming a hero despite being born without a Quirk in a world where superpowers are common.
author: Kohei Horikoshi

name: One Piece Vol. 1
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets out to sea to find the legendary treasure One Piece and become the next Pirate King.
author: Eiichiro Oda

name: Naruto Box Set 1 (Vol.1–27)
description: Follow Naruto Uzumaki from his academy days through the Chunin Exams in this comprehensive box set.
author: Masashi Kishimoto

name: Tokyo Ghoul Vol. 1
description: College student Ken Kaneki's life changes forever when he encounters a ghoul and becomes a half-ghoul himself.
author: Sui Ishida

name: Death Note Box Set
description: The complete Death Note series featuring Light Yagami's psychological battle with the detective L.
author: Tsugumi Ohba

name: Fullmetal Alchemist Vol. 1
description: Edward and Alphonse Elric attempt to use alchemy to bring their mother back to life with devastating consequences.
author: Hiromu Arakawa

name: Your Name Light Novel
short: The story behind the hit anime film
description: The original light novel that inspired the beloved anime film about two teenagers who mysteriously swap bodies.
author: Makoto Shinkai

name: Spirited Away Picture Book
short: Studio Ghibli's masterpiece in book form
description: A beautifully illustrated picture book adaptation of Hayao Miyazaki's Academy Award-winning film.
author: Hayao Miyazaki
